data.comment: The match has started at Olympiastadion.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 3, Hertha have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matheus Cunha for Hertha who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Matheus Cunha has recovered and rejoins the match in Berlin.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
Throw-in Hertha.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 14, Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Hertha!
In the minute 15, Matteo Guendouzi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hertha.
Felix Brych awards the home team a throw-in.
Felix Brych signals a Hertha throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Taiwo Awoniyi is on target to give Union Berlin a 0-1 advantage.
Marcus Ingvartsen instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 21, Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Hertha.
Robert Andrich (Union Berlin) has been shown a straight red card by referee Felix Brych.
In the minute 23, Felix Brych waits before resuming play because Robert Andrich for Union Berlin is still down.
The match at Olympiastadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lucas Tousart, who is down injured.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Robert Andrich is back on the pitch.
Hertha's Lucas Tousart is back in action after a slight knock.
Hertha to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hertha in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Hertha.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Hertha are pushing forward but Vladimir Darida's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Union Berlin at Olympiastadion.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Christopher Trimmel (Union Berlin) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
In the minute 39, Felix Brych signals a throw-in for Hertha, close to Union Berlin's area.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Hertha push upfield and Dodi Lukebakio gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Union Berlin defence.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
Union Berlin's Max Kruse breaks free at Olympiastadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Felix Brych awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Hertha in Berlin.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Felix Brych awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at Olympiastadion.
Union Berlin have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Felix Brych has blown to start the second-half.
Javairo Dilrosun is replacing Lucas Tousart for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
The home team replace Vladimir Darida with Krzysztof Piatek.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Hertha.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Hertha.
Throw-in Hertha.
In the minute 50, Krzysztof Piatek (Hertha) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Peter Pekarik is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Julian Ryerson is booked for the away team.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, Urs Fischer is making the team's first substitution at Olympiastadion with Sebastian Griesbeck replacing Taiwo Awoniyi.
Marvin Friedrich (Union Berlin) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Hertha in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 59, Free kick Union Berlin.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Hertha.
Christopher Lenz (Union Berlin) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Berlin Hertha attack through Krzysztof Piatek. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Throw-in for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 73, Felix Brych signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Goal! Krzysztof Piatek gives Hertha a 2-1 lead in Berlin.
That's a fine assist from Javairo Dilrosun.
In the minute 76, Felix Brych signals a Hertha throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Hertha to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Goal! Krzysztof Piatek extends Hertha's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 78, Niko Giesselmann is replacing Christopher Lenz for the away team.
Marius Bulter is on a sub for Christopher Trimmel for Union Berlin.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Union Berlin drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
In the minute 80, Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 82, Urs Fischer (Union Berlin) is making a fourth substitution, with Sheraldo Becker replacing Julian Ryerson.
Union Berlin make their fifth substitution with Cedric Teuchert replacing Grischa Promel.
Union Berlin are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 84, Matheus Cunha for Hertha has been booked by Felix Brych and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in Hertha.
In the minute 85, In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Maximilian Mittelstadt is replacing Dodi Lukebakio for the home team.
Free kick Union Berlin.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Union Berlin's Sebastian Griesbeck attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Krzysztof Piatek for Hertha drives towards goal at Olympiastadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
Free kick for Union Berlin in the half of Hertha.
That's full-time at Olympiastadion. The final score is 3-1.
The home team have replaced Peter Pekarik with Deyovaisio Zeefuik. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bruno Labbadia.
Bruno Labbadia (Hertha) is making a fifth substitution, with Mathew Leckie replacing Matheus Cunha.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Berlin to check on Max Kruse, who is grimacing with pain.
